alert.note: Alert for Bayfield (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 7:31PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN BAYFIELD COUNTY THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 731 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Herbster, or 38 miles east of Superior, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bayfield, Bayfield Peninsula Sea Caves, Sand Island, Herbster, York Island, Cornucopia, Sand Bay, Red Cliff, Madeline Island, Red Cliff Reservation, and Apostle Islands National Lake Shore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Wisconsin.
